name: Pokemon Kalos Crystal
summary: Pokemon Kalos Crystal is a sequel to Unova Red. This is a re-imagining of Generation 2, where the first generation of Pokemon was the Unova Pokedex, and the new second-generation Pokemon is the Kalos Pokedex. This game features all Pokemon from generations 5 and 6, and like in Unova Red, all Pokemon in the Pokedex is obtainable within a single playthrough.
